A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: [SPOILERS]  Why? Why? Why Disney ruined it?  I was a huge fan of SW.  This last movie does not capture the magic of the old series. Confusing\, dialogues boring\, the humour is forced and falls flaty\,  twists do not make no sense.... Many holes in the plot\, the story line was lazy.  Luke Skywalker is portrayed as weak\, uncaring and willing to attempt to kill his nephew in his sleep - which he would never do\, or even think of doing - especially someone unarmed.  \nThis movie is out of context from what Lucas originally created. I'm disappointed.....
